result.execSummary:
The defendant Antonio Z Carlisle was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess Dangerous Weapon-Person < 18, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 948.60(2)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes: Court will waive any costs and surcharges that can be waived.  Any mandatory costs and surcharges by 11-16-2015 or, as a penalty if not paid, convert to a civil judgment.
With credit for 4 days served; STRAIGHT TIME; NO ELECTRONIC MONITORING.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Antonio Z Carlisle

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Antonio Z Carlisle in court with attorney Francisco Araiza.  Joy Hammond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  

Defendant changes his plea to GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to his plea, advised of his Constitutional rights and the maximum penalty.   Defendant advised that if not a United States Citizen, deportation is possible.  Court found that defendant knowingly, voluntarily and intelligently waived his rights.  Guilty Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis to sustain defendant's plea.  Court found defendant guilty and ordered a Judgment of Conviction be entered on the record.  

Sentencing proceeded.  Statements by the State, defense and defendant.  Court sentenced defendant to serve 9 MONTHS in the House of Correction with credit for 4 days served; STRAIGHT TIME; NO ELECTRONIC MONITORING.

Court will waive any costs and surcharges that can be waived.  Any mandatory costs and surcharges by 11-16-2015 or, as a penalty if not paid, convert to a civil judgment.
Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief received and filed.

Defendant Antonio Z Carlisle in court.  Joy Hammond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Attorney Araiza was in court earlier but did not come back.  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 24.  Stipulated request for adjournment received and filed.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 17, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Antonio Z Carlisle in court with attorney Terese Dick for Francisco Araiza.  Joy Hammond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Attorney Araiza is in Judge Cimpl's court.  Due to the lateness of the hour, Court ordered case adjourned for plea/sentencing hearing in Branch 24.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 14, 2015 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Antonio Z Carlisle in court with attorney Francisco Araiza.  Joy Hammond appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Defense requested a final pretrial and jury trial date.  The State advised that an amended criminal complaint would be filed.  Defense requested time to speak with his client.  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 24.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for September 4, 2015 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Antonio Z Carlisle in court with attorney Francisco Araiza.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 24.  Court reiterated the no firearms order.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 17, 2015 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Antonio Z Carlisle in court with attorney Francisco Araiza.  Daniel J. Gabler appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk ssm.  Court ordered case adjourned for projected guilty plea in Branch 24.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for June 5, 2015 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Antonio Z Carlisle in court with attorney Francisco Araiza.  Deann L Heard appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Received discovery.  Continue with cooperation with JusticePoint.  Status conference scheduled for April 24, 2015 at 08:30 am.
JusticePoint Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

15RM017677  Actual Date Bond Posted with Sheriff:
04-03-15

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.  Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Lutreel R dob 1/21/84

Defendant Antonio Z Carlisle in court with attorney Joel H. Rosenthal.  Defendant Antonio Z Carlisle in custody.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Protasiewicz, Branch 24.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 10, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
